name: Without Her
description:
Her smile in every reflection,
              take your fill of your counterpart.

Best not to be distracted,
              or her death will haunt your heart.

And mind you with your delusions,
              that breaks windows and should smart.

But you miss her and you're sinking,
              should've moved on, bleeding heart.

A game of thinking back to the good times, while not being overwhelmed by her death.
All the while, hopefully not breaking too many windows in your delusional state.

Made for #BoltJam6
